html.description: The HTML to be converted to markdown
html.title: HTML

maxConsecutiveNewlines.description: Specify max consecutive new lines allowed
maxConsecutiveNewlines.title: Max Consecutive New Lines

useLinkReferenceDefinitions.description: Whether to Place URLS at the bottom and format links using link reference definitions
useLinkReferenceDefinitions.title: Place URLs At The Bottom

codeBlockStyle.description: Specify style for code block, default "fence"
codeBlockStyle.title: Style For Code Block

ignore.description: Supplied elements will be ignored (ignores inner text does not parse children)
ignore.title: Ignored Elements

keepDataImages.description: Whether to keep images with data: URI (Note: These can be up to 1MB each), e.g. <img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhEAAQAMQAAORHHOVSK......0o/">
keepDataImages.title: Keep Images With Data

globalEscape.description: Setting this will override the default escape settings, you might want to use textReplace option instead
globalEscape.title: Global Escape Pattern

textReplace.description: User-defined text replacement pattern (Replaces matching text retrieved from nodes)
textReplace.title: Text Replacement Pattern

blockElements.description: Supplied elements will be treated as blocks (surrounded with blank lines)
blockElements.title: Treat As Blocks

lineStartEscape.description: Setting this will override the default escape settings, you might want to use textReplace option instead
lineStartEscape.title: Line Start Escape Pattern

backslashEscapesHTMLTags.description: Whether to support for HTML Tag escaping ex: <div>foo</div>
backslashEscapesHTMLTags.title: Backslash Escapes HTML Tags

openLinksInNewWindow.description: Whether to open all links in new windows (by adding the attribute target="_blank" to <a> tags)
openLinksInNewWindow.title: Add Blank To Links

excludeTrailingPunctuationFromURLs.description: Whether to exclude trailing punctuation from autolinking URLs. Punctuation excluded: . ! ? ( ). Only applies if simplifiedAutoLink option is set to true.
excludeTrailingPunctuationFromURLs.title: Exclude Trailing Punctuation From URLs

ghCompatibleHeaderId.description: Whether to generate header IDs compatible with github style (spaces are replaced with dashes and a bunch of non alphanumeric chars are removed)
ghCompatibleHeaderId.title: GitHub Compatible Header IDs

tablesHeaderId.description: Whether to add an ID property to table headers tags
tablesHeaderId.title: Tables Header ID

strikethrough.description: Whether to enable support for strikethrough syntax
strikethrough.title: Strikethrough

ghMentionsLink.description: Whether to change the link generated by @mentions. Showdown will replace {u} with the username. Only applies if ghMentions option is enabled.
ghMentionsLink.title: GitHub Mention Link

customizedHeaderId.description: Whether to use text in curly braces as header ID
customizedHeaderId.title: Customized Header ID

completeHTMLDocument.description: Whether to output a complete html document, including <html>, <head> and <body> tags instead of an HTML fragment
completeHTMLDocument.title: Complete HTML Document

tables.description: Whether to enable support for tables syntax
tables.title: Tables Support

simpleLineBreaks.description: Whether to parse line breaks as <br>, like GitHub does, without needing 2 spaces at the end of the line
simpleLineBreaks.title: Simple Line Breaks

emoji.description: Whether to enable emoji support. Ex: this is a :smile: emoji For more info on available emojis, see https://github.com/showdownjs/showdown/wiki/Emojis.
emoji.title: Emoji Support

tasklists.description: Whether to enable support for GFM tasklists
tasklists.title: GitHub Task Lists

prefixHeaderId.description: Add a prefix to the generated header IDs
prefixHeaderId.title: Prefix Header ID

literalMidWordUnderscores.description: Whether to stop showdown from interpreting underscores in the middle of words as <em> and <strong> and instead treat them as literal underscores
literalMidWordUnderscores.title: Middle Word Underscores

ghCodeBlocks.description: Whether to enable support for GFM code block style
ghCodeBlocks.title: GitHub Code Blocks

rawPrefixHeaderId.description: Whether to prevent showdown from modifying the prefix
rawPrefixHeaderId.title: Raw Prefix Header ID

ghMentions.description: Whether to enable github @mentions, which link to the username mentioned
ghMentions.title: GitHub Mentions

simplifiedAutoLink.description: Whether to enable automatic linking to URLs
simplifiedAutoLink.title: Automatic Linking to URLs

splitAdjacentBlockquotes.description: Whether to split adjacent blockquote blocks
splitAdjacentBlockquotes.title: Split Adjacent Blockquotes

headerLevelStart.description: Whether to set the header starting level
headerLevelStart.title: Header Level Start

noHeaderId.description: Whether to disable the automatic generation of header IDs
noHeaderId.title: No Header ID

requireSpaceBeforeHeadingText.description: Whether to make adding a space between # and the header text mandatory
requireSpaceBeforeHeadingText.title: Mandatory Space Before Header

encodeEmails.description: Whether to enable e-mail addresses encoding through the use of Character Entities, transforming ASCII e-mail addresses into its equivalent decimal entities
encodeEmails.title: Encode Emails

rawHeaderId.description: Whether to remove only spaces, ' and " from generated header IDs (including prefixes), replacing them with dashes (-)
rawHeaderId.title: Raw Header ID

parseImgDimensions.description: Whether to enable support for setting image dimensions from within markdown syntax
parseImgDimensions.title: Parse Image Dimensions

smartIndentationFix.description: Whether to try to smartly fix indentation problems related to es6 template strings in the midst of indented code
smartIndentationFix.title: Smart Indentation Fix

literalMidWordAsterisks.description: Whether to stop showdown from interpreting asterisks in the middle of words as <em> and <strong> and instead treat them as literal asterisks
literalMidWordAsterisks.title: Middle Word Asterisks

disableForced4SpacesIndentedSublists.description: Whether to disable the requirement of indenting sublists by 4 spaces for them to be nested, effectively reverting to the old behavior where 2 or 3 spaces were enough
disableForced4SpacesIndentedSublists.title: Spaces Indented Sublists

markdown.description: The Markdown to be converted to html
markdown.title: Markdown

destinationKey.description: The field to put the output in. Specify nested fields using dots, e.g."level1.level2.newKey".
destinationKey.title: Destination Key

init_kwargs.title: Scade tools: Markdown
init_kwargs.description: Convert data between Markdown and HTML
